title: what happened to the old college road cinemas and what is being done to the building now?
text:
Chris,



Thanks to your question, StarNews reporter Jason Gonzales was able to
put together a story about the cinemas. Here's a link:



http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20101109/ARTICLES/101109625/1177?Title=UNCW-demolishes-old-cinema-building-to-make-more-parking-spaces
